usage: Strength training and exercise workouts at home or in the gym

ai_description: A pair of blue hexagonal dumbbells with a textured, non-slip neoprene coating. Each end is clearly printed in white with the brand name “KAKSS” and “5 KG”. The dumbbells have a compact, solid shape and are shown in clean studio shots and gym lifestyle scenes.
